title: Purchased the "First Strike Augment + Bundle"
body:
so earlier i made a post where i didnt receive "x" of the bonus items and about 2 hours later they arrived still with the exception of the "Recon Ashe Icon"
still just wondering why after purchasing the bundle its comming to my account bit by bit? this is the first time this has ever happened.

replies.body:
The bonus items were bugged and weren't being given to people, Riot said they were working on a fix.

but i am under the impression that Recon Ashe was never part of the bundle.
